description: Easy, filling and delicious, a perfect breakfast or brunch recipe.
keywords: Omelette,Seafood free,Christmas,Tree nut free,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Pie Maker Egg & Bacon Omelettes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl add eggs and slightly beat, add remaining ingredients. Stir well to mix together.

Turn on your pie maker (I used the Kmart pie maker) and spray with cooking spray. Add roughly 2 tablespoons of mixture to each pie hole and cook for approximately 8-9 minutes. Open lid and if cooked- turn off pie maker and then gently remove omelettes, transferring them to a cooling rack.
Turn pie maker back on and repeat step 2 until all ingredients are gone. I made 12 omelettes from this mixture.
